work.name: HireSweet
work.summary: Maintained a tech talent marketplace for startups, divided into a client-facing SPA and a candidate-facing one. Developed a recruitment CRM aimed at scaleups and staffing-oriented companies, as part of a team of 2 to 4 developers. Used **TypeScript**, **React**, **Less**, **Node**, **MongoDB** and **GraphQL**. Regularly reviewed build systems, coding practices and application performance with the CTO.

work.name: HeliosX
work.summary: Helped with UI design and implementation for new features in e-commerce applications using **Vue**, **SASS** and **vanilla JavaScript**.

work.name: Dotmatics
work.summary: Maintained entreprise-grade chemistry applications. Implemented a complete UI redesign to fit the company's new brand identity. Used **vanilla JavaScript** and **jQuery**.

work.name: Altran Technologies
work.summary: Maintained a **JavaEE** application used by every region in France to assign middle schoolers to high schools (or equivalent) using a variety of customisable criteria such as grades or location. Technologies used include **Spring**, **Hibernate**, **Quartz**, **IBM DB2** and **Apache Struts 1**. Used **Angular 8** and **CSS** to design and build the _Téléservice d'Affectation_, a web application to help parents find and choose a high school for their children.
